# Upload Data

```{r}
read_data <- function(i){
  filename <- paste("../data/angle_sigma1_results_",i,"_10_10", sep = "")
  dat <- read.csv(filename) %>%
    mutate(rho = i/10)
  return(dat)
}

dat <- lapply(1:10, read_data) %>% bind_rows
```

```{r}
true_tau <- 1

dat <- mutate(dat, 
              bias = abs(estimate - true_tau), 
              squared_err = (estimate-true_tau)**2,
              k = as.factor(k))

plt_data <- dat %>% 
  group_by(method, k, rho) %>% 
  summarize(mean_bias = mean(bias), mse = mean(squared_err), mean_gamma = mean(gamma)) %>%
  ungroup()

ggplot(plt_data, aes(x = rho, y = mean_bias, group = k, color = k)) + geom_line() + facet_wrap(~method)
```
